show_button_arrow.label: Show button arrow
show_button_arrow.info: Appears next to 'call to action' buttons and links

limit_search.label: Number of results shown per category

product_grid_aspect.label: Aspect ratio
product_grid_aspect.info: For ideal size and appearance, images should be uploaded or cropped at the same [aspect ratio](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio).

product_grid_image_fit.label: Image fit
product_grid_image_fit.info: Has no effect when aspect ratio is set to 'Original'

product_grid_border_color.label: Border color
product_grid_border_color.info: If left blank, will use default border color based on body background color.

variant_separator.label: Variant option separator
variant_separator.info: Doesn't show when label is hidden

header__1.info: The Cart drawer uses [Shopify's Product Recommendations API](https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/ajax-api/reference/product-recommendations) each time a new product is added to the cart. If Shopify's API doesn't find recommendation products or no products were added during the current page session, these products show instead

show_newsletter_globally.label: Show newsletter section on all pages

favicon.label: Favicon image
favicon.info: Will be scaled down to 32 x 32px

modal_success_message.label: Success message
modal_success_message.info: You can put [discount](/admin/discounts) codes in here

cookie_length.label: Only show to unique vistors every

enable_test_mode.label: Test mode
enable_test_mode.info: Popup will trigger on every exit intent on live site

enable_truncate.label: Truncate excerpts to same word count

grid_aspect.label: Aspect ratio
grid_aspect.info: For ideal size and appearance, images should be uploaded or cropped at the same [aspect ratio](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio).

image_fit.label: Image fit
image_fit.info: Has no effect when aspect ratio is set to 'Original'

show_collection_count.label: Show number of products in collection

header.info: If you have colors that are not one of the supported [colors](https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_colors.asp), you can add it here by using the exact name of the missing variant color and choosing the specific color to display

header__1.info: To add a language, go to your [language settings.](/admin/settings/languages)

header__2.info: To add a currency, go to your [payment settings.](/admin/settings/payments)

title.label: Heading
title.info: Manage your social media urls inside Theme Settings/ Social media. Leave the account field blank if you want the icon to be removed here

logo_width.label: Logo width
logo_width.info: This width will take effect only if original logo width is equal or greather

paragraph__1.content: To enable accounts, go to your [customer accounts settings.](/admin/settings/checkout)

header__5.info: Cycles through selected products for each menu that has more than one link level. If a product isn't selected, the featured product for that menu cycles through 'all' collection

image_mobile.label: Mobile Image
image_mobile.info: Leave blank to use desktop image

mobile_crop.label: Mobile sizing
mobile_crop.info: If 'Adapt' is selected, mobile height will adapt to image size and text instead of 'Mobile height' setting.

height.label: Minimum height
height.info: For ideal size and appearance, icon images should be the same size and [aspect ratio](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio)

enable_truncate.label: Truncate excerpts to same word count

label.label: Label
label.info: Use for any single line form input. The label cannot be left blank.

label.label: Label
label.info: The label cannot be left blank.

name.label: Instructions
name.info: Example: Choose a delivery location. Instructions cannot be left blank.

paragraph__1.content: All of your collections are listed by default. To customize your list, choose 'Selected' and add collections.

sort.label: Sort collections by:
sort.info: Sorting only applies when 'All' is selected

grid_aspect.label: Aspect ratio
grid_aspect.info: For ideal size and appearance, images should be uploaded or cropped at the same [aspect ratio](https://help.shopify.com/en/manual/shopify-admin/productivity-tools/image-editor#image-aspect-ratio).

image_fit.label: Image fit
image_fit.info: Has no effect when aspect ratio is set to 'Original'

show_collection_count.label: Show number of products in collection

paragraph__1.content: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

enable_image_zoom.label: Enable image zoom
enable_image_zoom.info: For best results, product images should be at least 1024x

header__3.info: Let customers add products to cart or scroll back to variant options easily

header__1.info: If you have colors that are not one of the supported [colors](https://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_colors.asp), you can add it here by using the exact name of the missing variant color and choosing the specific color to display

enable_payment_button.label: Show dynamic checkout button
enable_payment_button.info: Lets customers check out directly using a familiar payment method. [Learn more](https://help.shopify.com/manual/using-themes/change-the-layout/dynamic-checkout)

header__1.info: Swatches are detected by variant option names. For color swatches, names should be either Color or Colour. For style swatches, labels should be either Style or Type. [Learn how to set up swatches](https://smar7apps.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/articles/1500009862881-How-do-I-add-custom-color-swatch-images-)

enable_type_swatches.label: Enable style swatches
enable_type_swatches.info: Must have custom pngs uploaded to theme's asset folder. Example: style-shirt.png

color_swatch_style.label: Color swatches
color_swatch_style.info: To use 'Custom images' setting, you must have custom color pngs uplodaded to theme's asset folder. Example: color-navy.png

hide_single_option.label: Hide single options
hide_single_option.info: Hide option category if there is only one option displayed. If 'Show' sold out variants is selected, this option has no effect

header__3.info: If you'd like to show or hide Articles in the search results, those settings can be located in "Theme Settings > Search"

header__4.info: If you'd like to show or hide Pages in the search results, those settings can be located in "Theme Settings > Search"

header__1.info: Any customers who sign up will have an account created for them in Shopify. [View customers](/admin/customers?query=&accepts_marketing=1)

The Cart drawer uses [Shopify's Product Recommendations API](https://shopify.dev/docs/themes/ajax-api/reference/product-recommendations) each time a new product is added to the cart. If Shopify's API doesn't find recommendation products or no products were added during the current page session, these products show instead

image_mobile.label: Mobile Image
image_mobile.info: Leave blank to use desktop image

image.label: Cover image
image.info: Use cover image for ideal size and appearance when using text and overlay

video_link.label: Video link
video_link.info: Accepts YouTube or Vimeo links. Not all features supported by Vimeo.

height.label: Video height
height.info: Has no affect on mobile if 'Cover image' is left blank
